overview: MONSTERS OF METAL’s got two litte evil brothers. Their names: MONSTERS OF DEATH. Their character: vicious. MONSTERS OF DEATH doesn't waste your time with lullabies, instead it’s packed with the most deadly metal stuff conceivable: 55 video clips, cautiously compiled by Skandinavian-European and American style Death Metal, plus six live recordings and an ample audio section with new and unreleased stuff. In short: a blast for each and every death metal fan - not only because of the sheer amount of clips, but primarily because of their accurate selection.
title: Monsters Of Death Vol. 1
